title: Functional Polymer Coatings
description:
Focusing on a variety of coatings, this book provides detailed discussion on preparation, novel techniques, recent developments, and design theories to present the advantages of each function and provide the tools for better product performance and properties.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢    Provides detailed discussion on recent developments in the field as well as current and future perspectives
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢    Acts as a guide for polymer and materials researchers in optimizing polymer coating properties and increasing product performance
